text: 4.6: Sng 91.11-12; Zo 7.3-4Satan ana kov ndav, khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu maaŋ muuŋgip guigira Fhe Bakɨmen Kama guar, ndu khaŋ thɨgɨp fegɨmbɨra. Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ muuŋgi kameŋ ki. Mba kameŋ khaŋ nzuai, ‘Ana wo enseri ga suaŋrim, mbe ndu ganɨnga, bigɨn the ndun farfagirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mbe ndu suirav ndu vun fegɨrga, mba kɨma the ndu ŋkari thɨgɨrga tuktɨgi fhu.’ ”
